org.cauli.server

接口 DataHolder

  • 所有已知子接口:
    EventSourceConnection, HttpConnection, HttpRequest, WebSocketConnection
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractHttpConnection, EventSourceConnectionWrapper, HttpRequestWrapper, LoggingEventSourceConnection, LoggingWebSocketConnection, NettyEventSourceConnection, NettyHttpRequest, NettyWebSocketConnection, StubConnection, StubDataHolder, StubHttpRequest, WebSocketConnectionWrapper

    public interface DataHolder
    Objects implementing this interface can have arbitrary named values associated with them, making it easy to pass data around an application.
    作者:
    Joe Walnes

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Map<String,Object> data()
      Arbitrary data that can be stored for the lifetime of the connection.
      Object data(String key)
      Retrieve data value by key.
      DataHolder data(String key, Object value)
      Store data value by key.
      Set<String> dataKeys()
      List data keys.

    • 方法详细资料

      • data

        Map<String,Object> data()
        Arbitrary data that can be stored for the lifetime of the connection.

      • data

        Object data(String key)
        Retrieve data value by key.
        另请参阅:
        data()

      • data

        DataHolder data(String key,
              Object value)
        Store data value by key.
        另请参阅:
        data()

      • dataKeys

        Set<String> dataKeys()
        List data keys.
        另请参阅:
        data()
